markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Gorgon's Breath](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2004)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Inhaled" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=96" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 69 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Pathfinder #149: Against the Scarlet Triad](/Sources.aspx?ID=14) pg. 78</row>

**Price** 475 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Gorgon's breath is a fine powder that can easily enter living creatures' bloodstreams through their lungs before binding to mucous membranes and causing any nearby soft tissues to harden.

 **Saving Throw** DC 32 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 round; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) (1 round); **Stage 2** 4d6 bludgeoning damage and slowed 1 (1 round); **Stage 3** [petrified](/Conditions.aspx?ID=30) (1 round); **Stage 4** petrified permanently

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Gorgon's Breath
